abstracts.cdata!:
The Power Project which is DOMLEC's
            1988-1993 investment program will provide about 4 megawatts
            (MW) of additional hydro generation capacity. This will
            largely be accomplished by expanding the existing hdryoplant
            in Trafalgar and building a new one at Laudat. The project
            will also include expansion and improvements to the
            transmission and distribution facilities; the acquisition of
            equipment, tools and vehicles for operation and maintenance;
            training and technical assistance; expansion planning
            studies and a feasibility study for a dispatch center; and,
            engineering services for project implementation.
